collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (10 total Queries, 10 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `customer`.`full_name`, orders.ID as 'order_id', `orders`.`payment_id`, order_statuses.status as 'order_status_txt', order_statuses.ID as 'order_status_id', `order_total`, `order_date` FROM `orders` JOIN `customer` ON `customer`.`ID`=`orders`.`customer_id` JOIN `order_statuses` ON `order_statuses`.`ID`=`orders`.`order_status` ORDER BY `orders`.`order_date` DESC LIMIT 5

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `customer`.`full_name`, orders.ID as 'order_id', `orders`.`payment_id`, order_statuses.status as 'order_status_txt', order_statuses.ID as 'order_status_id', `order_total`, `order_date` FROM `orders` JOIN `customer` ON `customer`.`ID`=`orders`.`customer_id` JOIN `order_statuses` ON `order_statuses`.`ID`=`orders`.`order_status` ORDER BY `orders`.`order_date` DESC LIMIT 5
